text: Brandi and Amber were awesome! They were very sweet and attentive to our family  and our young children, Brandi kept my glass full, and was eager to make menu suggestions to fit our budget! Pizza was delicious and out  to us right away!  I visit Salisbury often and will definitely be back!üòå

name: N Flamer
text: Excellent pizza, wish I took a picture. was so good I ate the whole pie. Pan Pizza Blows away Dominoes & all others. Server was so nice, got my togo order in just before closing. Thanks!

name: Nathan Love
text: I ordered at 7:10, my coupons and corporate coupons were rejected by this store. Pizza left this Pizza Hut at 7:39, arrived at my house at 8:15. I live less than 5 minutes away. It was like the driver had the AC on my pizza the whole time. ‚Ä¶More

name: Tasha W.
text: Pizza Hut is my favorite place to grab a quick dinner every other week but lately I've been unimpressed. There pizza is really greasy and under cooked the last few times. The staff are great though very attentive and friendly. They just need to work on the pizza.

name: Johnathon Brunson
text: Good place, The worker Johnathon is a hard worker he should run the entire restaurant, nice young man.

name: Becky Tarlton
text: Really good food.  Service was quick. Child friendly.  Good parking.  Bread sticks were especially yummy.

name: Corgi Mom
text: The wings were fantastic as always. However the "fresh" salad I ordered was anything but fresh! This was all "to go" so didn't realize the salad was so old and brown and discusting til I got home 12 miles later. NEVER AGAIN WILL I ORDER A SALAD THERE!!! (Salisbury NC)

text: Food is always good along with service.  If you lucky, go through the drive thru and you have racoons fighting cats on Saturday nights. Lol.

text: I watched a manager fix pizzas without washing her hands after taking orders and serving drive by and a new hire tried to lie for her saying she washed her hands. 12 October 2018, 7pmish. Really Pizza Hut. Salisbury NC !!!!!!! Go out of business before you hurt or kill someone.
